indications:
Indications adjunct in gastro-intestinal disorders characterised by smooth muscle
spasm; dysmenorrhoea
name: ALVERINE CITRATE
breadcrumbs: 1.2 Antispasmodics and other drugs altering gut motility
side-effects:
Side-effects nausea; dyspnoea; headache, dizziness; pruritus,
rash; hepatitis also reported
doses: adult and child over 12 years, 60–120 mg 1–3 times daily
